author_name: Mullā Muḥammad ibn Murtaḍā ibn Maḥmūd al-Kašānī
tafsir_name: aṣ-Ṣāfī fī tafsīr kalām Allāh al-wāfī
Taysīr al-karīm ar-raḥmān fī tafsīr kalām al-mannān
al-Baḥr al-madīd fī tafsīr al-Qurʾān al-maǧīd

author_name: ʿAbd ar-Raḥmān ibn ʿAlī ibn al-Ǧawzī
Muḥammad ibn ʿAbdallāh ibn Abī Zamanīn
Abū Bakr Ǧābir ibn Mūsā ibn ʿAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧazāʾirī
Ḥāfiẓ ad-Dīn Abū l-Barakāt ʿAbdallāh ibn Aḥmad an-Nasafī
Abū Manṣūr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd as-Samarqandī al-Māturīdī
Laǧnat al-Qurʾān wa-s-Sunna fī Maǧlis al-Aʿlā li-š-Šuʾūn al-Islāmiyya
Ǧalāl ad-Dīn ʿAbd ar-Raḥmān Ibn Abī Bakr as-Suyūṭī
